title: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
description: JoJoâ€™s Bizarre Adventure is a multigenerational action-fantasy epic that follows the Joestar bloodline, with each part starring a new hero, new style, and new supernatural powers. Known for its iconic poses, wild fashion, creative battles, and constant reinvention, JoJo mixes drama, humor, horror, and spectacle into one of the most stylish series ever made.

title: Oyasumi Pun Pun
description: Oyasumi Punpun is a dark coming-of-age drama about a boy named Punpun whose life unravels through trauma, obsession, love, and self-destruction. Blending surreal imagery with brutal emotional realism, it explores depression, abuse, relationships, and the struggle to find meaning in a collapsing world.

title: Yotsubato
description: A slice-of-life manga following the curious and energetic Yotsuba as she explores the world around her.
